summary: Page 9 continues from section yod-aleph and covers sections yod-bet through tet-zayin of chapter 2. The continuation fragment correctly captures the end of section yod-aleph. All section numbers are sequential. Source references appear mostly accurate. Page ends cleanly.

issues.description: OCR reads 'אמנם קיימים וגדרי חכמים' - the word 'קיימים' should be 'סייגים' (fences/safeguards), matching the section title 'על סייגים וגדרי חכמים'.
OCR reads 'ומבואר בפקה"ק' - this abbreviation is unusual. It should likely be 'בספה"ק' (in the holy book), a standard abbreviation.
OCR reads 'מה שעשיתם אתם המלוות' - the word 'המלוות' seems unusual in context. It may be 'המצוות' (the mitzvot) which makes more sense.
OCR reads 'אשר אין לו תוכח הגוף עליו' - the word 'תוכח' is likely 'תוכחת' (rebuke/proof of).
Source ref is 'ויריעות שלמה, ש"ח, ו' - the leading vav seems to be part of the abbreviation or a misread. Should likely be 'דרשות יריעות שלמה ש"ח ו' or simply 'יריעות שלמה, ש"ח ו''.
